page.title: 09RESCOBIE LOCH - RECREATION
page.content: {RECREATION}in Rescobie loch is mainly {FISHING}but also some{SAILING.}During the fishing season hundreds of anglers fish there. Only permit holders may fish and they may only fly fish, sometimes from the bank and sometimes from boats which can be hired at the lochside. Permits are bought from the Rescobie Fishing Organization and the prices are Â£9 for young anglers and Â£20 for older anglers. Gamekeepers patrol the area and poachers may receive heavy fines. {FISH TYPES}have changed since at one time there were no trout to be found in the loch and only eels and pike could be caught. Now rainbow trout and brown trout are the types of fish to be caught.
